sentences.en: Normal car can reach trailhead easily.
sentences.cn: 普通车辆可轻易抵达停车场。

sentences.en: Immediately after lunch we made for the trailhead.
sentences.cn: 午饭过后，我们立即前往山道的起点。

sentences.en: I parked at the la Plata Trailhead and walked to the nearby bridge that crosses Lake Creek.
sentences.cn: 我把车子停泊在拉普拉塔特雷尔·黑德，步行到附近横跨湖河的桥上。
